evidence_extraction:
[
  "Mr. Moderator, Rev. Cleage, brothers and sisters and friends, and I see some enemies.",
  "The political philosophy of black nationalism only means that the black man should control the politics and the politicians in his own community.",
  "His gospel is white nationalism, our gospel is black nationalism.",
  "you have twenty-two million Afro-Americans whose churches are being bombed, whose little girls are being murdered, whose leaders are being shot down in broad daylight?",
  "When the government of South Africa began to trample upon the human rights of the people of South Africa they were taken to the U.N.",
  "We have injected ourselves into the civil rights struggle. And we intend to expand it from the level of civil rights to the level of human rights.",
  "Whenever you got a racial powder keg sitting in your lap, you're in more trouble than if you had an atomic powder keg sitting in your lap. When a racial powder keg goes off, it doesn't care who it knocks out the way. Understand this, it's dangerous.",
  "If you don't see it you're finished. If you don't see it you're going to become involved in some action in which you don't have a chance.",
  "Here he is standing up in front of other people, Uncle Sam, with the blood of your and mine mothers and fathers on his hands. With the blood dripping down his jaws like a bloody-jawed wolf.",
  "It will take black nationalism to bring about the freedom of 22 million Afro-Americans, here in this country, where we have suffered colonialism for the past 400 years.",
  "Black nationalism is a self-help philosophy.",
  "Join any kind of organization – civic, religious, fraternal, political or otherwise that's based on lifting the black man up and making him master of his own community.",
  "The white man, the white man is too intelligent to let someone else come and gain control of the economy of his community. But you will let anybody come in and control the economy of your community...",
  "The Man is becoming richer and richer, and you're becoming poorer and poorer.",
  "We don't see any American dream. We've experienced only the American nightmare.",
  "Mr. Moderator, Rev. Cleage, brothers and sisters and friends, and I see some enemies.",
  "All of us catch hell from the same enemy. We're all in the same bag, in the same boat.",
  "This is a government filibuster. It's not a segregationist filibuster, it's a government filibuster. Any kind of activity that takes place on the floor of the Congress or the Senate, that's the government. ...And anytime you find the government involved in a conspiracy to violate the citizenship or the civil rights of a people in 1964, then you are wasting your time going to that government expecting redress.",
  "The political philosophy of black nationalism only means that the black man should control the politics and the politicians in his own community.",
  "Revolutions overturn systems. Revolutions destroy systems.",
  "I'm not for separation and you're not for integration, what you and I are for is freedom.",
  "The political philosophy of black nationalism only means that we will have to carry on a program, a political program, of reeducation – to open our people's eyes, make us become more politically conscious, politically mature.",
  "The economic philosophy of black nationalism only means that we should own and operate and control the economy of our community.",
  "So I say in my conclusion, the only way we're going to solve it: we got to unite. We got to work together in unity and harmony. And black nationalism is the key."
]
